requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A baseball fan visiting the site to check his favorite player's latest stats.
user_goal: View up-to-date statistics for a specific player by navigating through the UI.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the website and sees navigation tabs for Players, Teams, and Games. He wants to find stats for a particular player.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Players' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page fetches and displays a list of players from the backend API.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Player
narrative_steps.description: Alex scrolls through the player list and clicks on his favorite player’s name to see more details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a player's name card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal appears showing detailed stats fetched dynamically from the backend.

requirement_tested: A backend API server that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer deploying the app locally for testing.
user_goal: Verify that the backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database with correct credentials.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Jamie starts the backend server after setting the required environment variables for DB connection.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` in the server directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server initializes and logs successful connection to PostgreSQL using provided DB_HOST, DB_PORT, etc.

requirement_tested: Player statistics tracking with detailed views for individual player performance metrics
user_persona: A fantasy baseball manager evaluating potential roster additions.
user_goal: Examine a player’s historical stats to decide whether to draft them.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Player Details
narrative_steps.description: Taylor selects a player from the roster list and views their performance card.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a player's profile card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal displays key metrics like batting average, home runs, RBIs, ERA, and strikeouts.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Extended Stats
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by the overview, Taylor clicks to see the full history and trends.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Extended Stats' button within the modal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Graphs and additional data points appear showing year-over-year improvements or declines.

requirement_tested: Team management functionality allowing users to create, edit, and manage baseball teams
user_persona: A new league commissioner setting up teams for the upcoming season.
user_goal: Set up multiple baseball teams with unique identities and budgets.

narrative_steps.title: Creating First Team
narrative_steps.description: Jordan navigates to the Teams section and begins creating the first team for the league.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out team creation form fields and click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New team record is saved in the database and appears in the team listing.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Existing Team Info
narrative_steps.description: After realizing a mistake in the team name, Jordan edits the entry.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Edit' button next to the team and update the name field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Updated team information is persisted in the database and reflected immediately.

requirement_tested: Team roster management enabling users to add, remove, and organize players within teams
user_persona: A team owner preparing for the draft.
user_goal: Build a competitive roster by adding top prospects and releasing underperformers.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Players to Roster
narrative_steps.description: Morgan finds promising free agents and adds them to her team roster.
narrative_steps.action: Click the '+' button beside each desired player in the free agent pool.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected players are added to the team roster table instantly.

narrative_steps.title: Removing Underperforming Players
narrative_steps.description: Later, Morgan notices some players aren't contributing enough and decides to cut them.
narrative_steps.action: Click the '-' button next to those players in the roster table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Those players are removed from the roster and returned to the free agent pool.

requirement_tested: Financial management system for tracking and managing team finances
user_persona: A financially conscious team owner monitoring club expenditures.
user_goal: Ensure the team stays within budget while making strategic signings.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Current Balance
narrative_steps.description: Casey visits the finance dashboard to review how much money remains in the budget.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Finance section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard shows updated balance, revenue, and expense figures retrieved from the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Transaction History
narrative_steps.description: Curious about where funds went, Casey checks the transaction log.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the balance summary area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a page listing all past transactions with dates, amounts, and descriptions.

requirement_tested: Live game simulation engine that processes games based on team strategies and lineups
user_persona: An impatient coach eager to see the results of his tactical choices.
user_goal: Simulate a match using customized strategies and watch it unfold in real time.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Up Game Strategy
narrative_steps.description: Pat arranges the batting order, selects the starting pitcher, and sets defensive positions.
narrative_steps.action: Drag players into lineup slots and select options from dropdown menus.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Strategy parameters are captured and ready to be submitted to the simulation engine.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Simulation
narrative_steps.description: Excited to see the outcome, Pat presses the big Start Simulation button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Start Simulation' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Simulation begins, and real-time events start streaming back to the browser.

requirement_tested: Game result visualization displaying outcomes of simulated baseball games
user_persona: A sports journalist writing recaps after watching several simulated matches.
user_goal: Quickly understand game outcomes and key plays to craft compelling articles.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Final Score
narrative_steps.description: Dana finishes watching a game and looks at the final score displayed prominently.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the scoreboard canvas after simulation completes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Canvas shows inning-by-inning scoring along with the final score and MVP award.

narrative_steps.title: Analyzing Box Score
narrative_steps.description: Wanting deeper insights, Dana examines the box score beneath the visual summary.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down to view the tabular box score below the scoreboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table presents hits, runs, errors, and other vital stats broken down by team and inning.

requirement_tested: Interactive controls for adjusting team strategies and lineups before game simulation
user_persona: A meticulous strategist planning ahead for tomorrow’s big matchup.
user_goal: Optimize lineup placement and pitching rotation to maximize chances of victory.

narrative_steps.title: Arranging Batting Order
narrative_steps.description: Quinn drags his best hitters to the top of the batting order.
narrative_steps.action: Drag player cards into preferred batting slots.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Batting order reflects the new arrangement visually and internally.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Pitcher Rotation
narrative_steps.description: Quinn selects his ace pitcher from the dropdown menu for today's game.
narrative_steps.action: Select pitcher from the 'Starting Pitcher' dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chosen pitcher is highlighted and set for use during simulation.

requirement_tested: User interface with floral white background and dark goldenrod interactive elements
user_persona: A designer checking brand consistency across the platform.
user_goal: Confirm that the site uses the correct colors consistently throughout.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Background Color
narrative_steps.description: Riley inspects the overall look of the homepage layout.
narrative_steps.action: Open DevTools and inspect the body background style.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background color is confirmed as floral white (#fffaf0).

narrative_steps.title: Testing Interactive Element Colors
narrative_steps.description: Next, Riley hovers over interactive buttons to verify hover effects.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over primary buttons like 'Login' or 'Submit'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Buttons turn slightly darker shades of dark goldenrod (#b8860b) on hover.

requirement_tested: Authentication and user session management for personalized team and game data
user_persona: A registered user returning to continue managing his virtual team.
user_goal: Log in securely to access his personal team dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Sam enters his email and password into the login form.
narrative_steps.action: Enter credentials and click the Submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Upon verification, Sam receives a JWT token stored in localStorage and is redirected to his dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Protected Data
narrative_steps.description: Now logged in, Sam tries accessing his team management page.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to /teams route.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page loads successfully since valid auth token allows access to protected resources.

requirement_tested: Data persistence for storing player stats, team information, financial records, and game results
user_persona: A system administrator performing maintenance checks.
user_goal: Ensure that critical application data survives restarts and updates.

narrative_steps.title: Restarting Application
narrative_steps.description: Devon shuts down and restarts the application to test data retention.
narrative_steps.action: Stop and restart both frontend and backend services.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All previously entered data—players, teams, finances—is still present after reload.

requirement_tested: Real-time updates for game simulation progress and results
user_persona: A live commentator covering an online baseball tournament.
user_goal: Provide instant commentary as the game unfolds without refreshing the page.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Live Game Feed
narrative_steps.description: Cameron launches a simulation and watches for real-time commentary.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Start Simulation' and observe the live event stream.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Play-by-play text updates appear continuously in the feed as events occur.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Progress Bar
narrative_steps.description: While waiting, Cameron glances at the progress indicator.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the progress bar during simulation execution.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Progress bar fills smoothly as the game advances toward completion.

requirement_tested: Responsive design compatible with desktop and mobile viewing
user_persona: A casual fan browsing the site on his phone during lunch break.
user_goal: Easily navigate and interact with the site despite limited screen space.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Tara opens the site on her smartphone and explores different sections.
narrative_steps.action: Resize window to mobile dimensions or open on actual device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: UI adapts responsively with collapsible menus, larger touch targets, and readable fonts.

requirement_tested: Repository configuration with package.json supporting npm run install:all and npm run dev
user_persona: A new contributor joining the project for the first time.
user_goal: Set up the development environment quickly using standard npm commands.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Leo clones the repo and needs to get everything running locally.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed concurrently without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Running Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: With dependencies installed, Leo starts both servers together.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend servers launch simultaneously and communicate properly.
